description: Maximize the power of your high-megapixel DSLR or Mirrorless Interchangeable Lens (MIL) camera, HD camcorder, or high-end point-and-shoot camera with the Lexar Professional 133x SDXC card. This high-speed, Class 10 card provides massive storage capacities and incredible professional-level performance with a minimum guaranteed speed of 133x (20MB/s). This makes it an excellent choice for sustained, rapid-fire shooting or capturing up to a full 48 hours of stunning 1080p HD video with your SDXC-compatible camera-all on a single 128GB card. Includes downloadable Image Rescue 4 software to recover lost or deleted photo and video files, and comes with a limited lifetime warranty.
title: Lexar 64 GB SDXC Flash Memory Card LSD64GCRBNA133
